basic.description:
A review of the fundamentals of Spanish, in cultural contexts, designed to develop aural, oral, reading and writing skills.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
RECOMMENDATION    4U Spanish.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Español intermedio

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of C in SPAN101 or SPAN112.
One way exclusion    May not be taken with or after SPAN201; SPAN205; SPAN301; SPAN302; SPAN303; SPAN304; SPAN401; SPAN402.
